name: Romantic French Chateau
description:
DESCRIPTION
If you are planning a wedding in France and are looking for a stunning and elegant venue full of history, this stunning Château, ideally located at 1h15 from Orly Airport, will take your breath away.
Its 4 independent houses, its Chapel (with up to 50 seats), and its former stables now a reception room, make it the ideal wedding venue. The reception room can hold up to 160 guests. Enjoy the exclusive use of the houses & gardens throughout your stay. You will fall in love with the stunning interiors, the luxurious accommodations with 19 bedrooms and up to 55 guests, the outdoor swimming-pool, the tennis court and the amazing scenery that create an exquisite backdrop for a wedding ceremony.
You can truly create the wedding of your dreams, with the suppliers of your choosing. If you would prefer to leave the planning of your event in expert hands, the Château’s team will recommend a list of local suppliers who are used to working at the venue.
If you have any further questions then please don't hesitate to ask.
additional_info:
FEATURES

Hotel recommendation list
